2. City Departments

City Departments
================

Administration
--------------

Access information regarding the city’s attorney, manager, secretary and treasurer.  
[City Manager](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/81/City-Manager "City Manager")  
[City Secretary](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/88/City-Secretary "City Secretary")  
[Finance Director](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/89/City-Treasurer "City Treasurer")  
[City Attorney](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/80/City-Attorney "City Attorney")  
[Marketing Director](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/314/Marketing-Director "Marketing Director")

City Council
------------

Find information about the City Council, its members and its various boards and commissions.  [City Council](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/66/City-Council "City Council")

Development Services
--------------------

View information about building inspections, permits and code enforcement.  [Development Services](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/98/Community-Services-Department "Community Services")

Emergency Services
------------------

Access information on the city’s emergency medical services and police and volunteer fire departments.  
[Emergency Management](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/306/Emergency-Management "Emergency Management")  
[EMS](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/108/Emergency-Medical-Services "EMS") - Emergency Medical Services  
[RVFD](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/110/Rockdale-Volunteer-Fire-Department "RVFD") - Rockdale Volunteer Fire Department

**In an Emergency, Seconds Count.**  
[Help Emergency Responders find your home.](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/3351)  
Option to Order an Address Number Sign for your Home.

Lucy Hill Patterson Memorial Library
------------------------------------

Learn about the Lucy Hill Patterson Memorial Library as well as its services, regulations, programs and events.  [Lucy Hill Patterson Memorial Library](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/115/Lucy-Hill-Patterson-Memorial-Library "Lucy Hill Patterson Memorial Library")

Municipal Court
---------------

Find valuable information related to the Municipal Court, including costs, case dismissals, procedures and dockets.  [Municipal Court](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/119/Municipal-Court "Municipal Court")

Public Works
------------

Access information about the city's airport, cemeteries, garbage collection, parks, streets and wastewater andwater systems.  [Public Works](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/67/Public-Works-Department "Public Works")
